alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued December 09 at 8:08PM CST until December 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 716 REMAINS VALID UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 PARISHES IN NORTHEAST LOUISIANA CATAHOULA CONCORDIA TENSAS IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 34 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI ATTALA CHOCTAW COPIAH HINDS HOLMES LEAKE MADISON RANKIN SCOTT SIMPSON SMITH YAZOO IN EAST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI CLARKE JASPER KEMPER LAUDERDALE NESHOBA NEWTON NOXUBEE WINSTON IN NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI WEBSTER IN NORTHEAST MISSISSIPPI CLAY LOWNDES OKTIBBEHA IN SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI JEFFERSON DAVIS LAWRENCE LINCOLN IN SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI COVINGTON JONES IN SOUTHWEST MISSISSIPPI ADAMS CLAIBORNE FRANKLIN JEFFERSON IN WEST CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI WARREN THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ACKERMAN, BASSFIELD, BAY SPRINGS, BRANDON, BROOKHAVEN, BROOKSVILLE, BUDE, CANTON, CARTHAGE, COLLINS, COLUMBUS, CONEHATTA, CRYSTAL SPRINGS, DE KALB, DECATUR, DURANT, EUPORA, FAYETTE, FERRIDAY, FOREST, GOODMAN, HARRISONBURG, HAZLEHURST, HEIDELBERG, JACKSON, JONESVILLE, KOSCIUSKO, LAUREL, LEXINGTON, LOUISVILLE, MACON, MADISON, MAGEE, MATHISTON, MEADVILLE, MENDENHALL, MERIDIAN, MONTICELLO, MORTON, MOUNT OLIVE, NATCHEZ, NEW HEBRON, NEWELLTON, NEWTON, PEARL, PEARL RIVER, PHILADELPHIA, PICKENS, PORT GIBSON, PRENTISS, QUITMAN, RALEIGH, RICHLAND, RIDGELAND, ROXIE, SCOOBA, SHUBUTA, ST. JOSEPH, STARKVILLE, STONEWALL, TAYLORSVILLE, TCHULA, UNION, VICKSBURG, VIDALIA, WATERPROOF, WEIR, WESSON, WEST FERRIDAY, WEST POINT, AND YAZOO CITY.
